title: Mojang：骄傲游行2017
author: MineCrocodile
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MineCrocodile 于 2017-9-3 16:14 编辑 



Mojang：我们制作了骄傲游行2017的视频！为什么？因为每个人不管他是谁，他爱谁，都应该被接纳！<3


MOJANG CELEBRATES PRIDE 2017!MOJANG庆祝骄傲游行2017！

We believe in building a better world我们相信世界更美好



We here at Mojang were delighted to take part in this year’s Pride parade in Stockholm. It was a fun old time, walking through the streets of beautiful (and only slightly rainy) Stockholm, surrounded by loud music, dancing and cube-shaped, helium-filled balloons. 
我们Mojang非常高兴能参加今年在斯德哥尔摩的骄傲游行。在美丽的斯德哥尔摩街道穿行（微雨蒙蒙），被震耳欲聋的音乐，舞蹈和方块形状的氦气球包围，是一段有趣的时光。
More importantly than simply being a good laugh, however, Pride was a celebration of equality - and that’s something we believe in passionately at Mojang. Obviously that applies to Minecraft: we want everyone to feel welcome playing our game, and we are lucky to have such an amazing diverse, global community. But it’s much more than that. You should be accepted as who you are, whatever you are, whoever you love, wherever you go.
比单纯高兴更重要的是，骄傲游行是在庆祝平等—这在我们Mojang是深信不疑的。当然对于Minecraft也是一样：我们希望每个人在玩我们的游戏时都能感受到欢迎，而且我们对拥有这样一个多元的全球玩家社区感到十分幸运。更重要的是，不管你是谁，你是啥，你爱谁，你去哪，都应该被接纳。
Anyway, we made a nice, extremely short video about it.
总之，我们拍了一个不错的短视频
Go build a better world!
一起让世界更美好！
Written byMarsh Davies
